title: What is This
body:
http://i.imgur.com/bup7IZy.png

That's what happens when I go to the store... ?

replies.body: It looks like your network might have a connection issue with the store and unable to load its assets.  As a first step, I recommend going over the instructions in the [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to get this fixed up.  If you continue to have further problems, please let me know!
Thanks. I've just never seen it before so I wanted to know <3
